page.title: 18Droitwich - Child Leisure
page.content: Yard Games - Foxes and Hounds _____________________________ played by two sides - the Foxes(the runners) and the Hounds (the chasers). Object - ______ Hounds catch a fox to hold captive at their base. Remaining foxes try to set free the captives by touching a part of their body. When all the foxes are caught the two sides change over. Chain Tig _________ - Chaser catches somebody and they join hands and both become chasers. When the chasers become 4 split into 2 pairs.Continue until there are no loose runners. Evening Leisure Activities _____________________________ Ice-skating,swimming club, gym club. Ice-skating in Solihull,B'ham- wear jeans, blue top. 6.30 - 10.30.
